alert.note: Alert for Koochiching; North Itasca; North St. Louis; South Itasca (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued April 19 at 9:52PM CDT until April 21 at 7:00AM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 7 AM THURSDAY TO 7 AM CDT FRIDAY... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 9 inches and ice accumulations of a light glaze. * WHERE...Koochiching, North St. Louis, North Itasca and South Itasca Counties. This includes the Tribal Lands of the Bois Forte Band, Deer Creek and, Nett Lake areas. * WHEN...From 7 AM Thursday to 7 AM CDT Friday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Mixed precipitation is most likely Thursday before the heaviest snowfall is possible starting Thursday evening and lasting into Friday morning. Localized accumulations up to 9 inches may occur in Koochiching County by Friday midday.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1. Road conditions can also be found at 511mn.org for Minnesota or 511wi.gov for Wisconsin.

area.areaDesc: Koochiching; North Itasca; North St. Louis; South Itasca
